remarks: Value of the group sum operation over an index set with finite support.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumval3a as of 29-May-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumval3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumval3.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumval3.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumval3.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumval3.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumval3.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumval3.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumval3.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumval3a.t $e |- ( ph -> W e. Fin ) $.
gsumval3a.n $e |- ( ph -> W =/= (/) ) $.
gsumval3aOLD.w $e |- W = ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
gsumval3aOLD.i $e |- ( ph -> -. A e. ran ... ) $.
gsumval3aOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( iota x E. f ( f : ( 1 ... ( # ` W ) ) -1-1-onto-> W /\ x = ( seq 1 ( .+ , ( F o. f ) ) ` ( # ` W ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .+ f x $.
$d .0. x $.
$d A f x $.
$d B f x $.
$d F f x $.
$d G f x $.
$d V x $.
$d W f x $.
$d f ph x $.
